SEARCH
Module main_module
Package main_module.model.entities

Class Ia

java.lang.Object
main_module.model.entities.Ia
public class Ia extends Object
Represents the artificial intelligence (AI) logic for controlling an enemy character in the game.

    • isPlayerVisible

      public boolean isPlayerVisible(Player player, int[][] nonDestroyableTilesRepresentation, int[][] destroyableTilesRepresentation)
      Checks if the player is visible to the enemy.
      Parameters:
      player - The player character in the game.
      nonDestroyableTilesRepresentation - The representation of non-destroyable tiles in the game.
      destroyableTilesRepresentation - The representation of destroyable tiles in the game.
      Returns:
      True if the player is visible, false otherwise.

    • changeInertiaRand

      public Direction changeInertiaRand(Set<Direction> collidingDirection, Direction inertia)
      Changes the current inertia based on the available directions and a random selection.
      Parameters:
      collidingDirection - The set of directions in which the enemy is colliding with other entities.
      inertia - The current inertia direction.
      Returns:
      The new inertia direction.

    • changeInertiaInOrder

      public Direction changeInertiaInOrder(Set<Direction> collidingDirection, Direction inertia)
      Changes the current inertia based on the available directions in order.
      Parameters:
      collidingDirection - The set of directions in which the enemy is colliding with other entities.
      inertia - The current inertia direction.
      Returns:
      The new inertia direction.

    • logic2

      public void logic2(int[][] nonDestroyableTilesRepresentation, int[][] destroyableTilesRepresentation, Player player, boolean adjacency, boolean directed)
      Determines the movement logic for an enemy character based on the given parameters.
      Parameters:
      nonDestroyableTilesRepresentation - Representation of non-destroyable tiles in the game.
      destroyableTilesRepresentation - Representation of destroyable tiles in the game.
      player - The player character in the game.
      adjacency - Specifies whether to consider adjacency in pathfinding.
      directed - Specifies whether the movement should be directed.

    • adjust

      public Direction adjust(Direction directionToGo, MatrixCor enemyPosInMatrix, MatrixCor nextCell)
      Adjusts the direction to go based on collision and the next cell in the path.
      Parameters:
      directionToGo - The original direction to go.
      enemyPosInMatrix - The current position of the enemy in matrix coordinates.
      nextCell - The next cell in the path to reach the target.
      Returns:
      The adjusted direction to go.

    • getNextDirectionToGoAccordingToPath

      public Direction getNextDirectionToGoAccordingToPath(List<MatrixCor> path, MatrixCor enemyPosInMatrix)
      Gets the next direction to go based on the current path and the enemy's position.
      Parameters:
      path - The path to the target.
      enemyPosInMatrix - The current position of the enemy in matrix coordinates.
      Returns:
      The next direction to go.
